items.sentence: Tom told me that it was Mary who had organized the party.
Tom has a good grasp of grammar, but is weak in spelling.
Tom's car wouldn't start and he had to get a new battery.
It's not likely that Tom will ever admit that he's wrong.
What did you think of the movie on a scale of one to ten?
I thought that you were supposed to be looking after Tom.
I thought that Tom wouldn't be able to understand French.
I doubt very seriously Tom will be in Boston next Monday.
It's good that you were able to go to Australia with Tom.
I figure that there's no point in trying to persuade Tom.
